leather_archer_hood.description: Two helmets is better than one!

zilla_archer_vest.description: The most prized armor for big game hunters.

zilla_archer_hood.description: Will surely strike fear into your foes.

leather_archer_vest_recipe.description: Provides additional protection for your archers
leather_archer_vest_recipe.flavor: Remind me why you need this again?

leather_archer_hood_recipe.description: A leather helmet to pad out your archer's headgear
leather_archer_hood_recipe.flavor: It's like a helmet inside a helmet!

varanus_archer_vest_recipe.description: A Varanus skin vest for experienced archers

varanus_archer_hood_recipe.description: A hood made out of Varanus skins for archers

zilla_archer_vest_recipe.description: A vest made out of Zilla skins, for your most experienced archers

zilla_archer_hood_recipe.description: The pinnacle of archer hood fashion
zilla_archer_hood_recipe.flavor: Almost lets you summon volcanic earthquakes.

na_horned_helm.flavor: For when you feel like touting your horn(s)

bronze_cleric_breastplate_recipe.description: Provides some protection for your wanna-be Paladins
bronze_cleric_breastplate_recipe.flavor: Does not require lawful good alignment.

iron_cleric_mail_recipe.description: Provides fair protection for your wanna-be Paladins
iron_cleric_mail_recipe.flavor: Requires the Strength domain to equip.

steel_cleric_chainmail.description: Provides great protection for your wanna-be Paladins
steel_cleric_chainmail.flavor: Requires lawful good alignment (To be implemented).
